channel.title: 562 Loading 602 DEOB does it work on xp?
channel.description:
My friend who runs Windows XP tried the run: [code]@echo off title deob client! cd bin java -Xmx1024m -cp . client pause[/code]
Why doesn't this work for him? (does he needJDK?- if he does how do I make it work without JDK) Please help me out :-D
